tables.title: Frontier Patrols
tables.description: Travel complications and allies along woodland trade roads.

entries.result: A disoriented rider mistakes the party for bandits and draws steel.
A druid circle requests help relocating a trapped owlbear cub.
A caravan of refugees seeks safe escort away from recent raids.
A wounded scout delivers a warning: hobgoblin forces march at dusk.
A fey court messenger offers a bargain to bypass their glade.
A toll bridge is held by mercenaries with dubious paperwork.
A rival adventuring party shares rumors of a haunted milestone.
A bandit ambush triggers as an uprooted tree crashes down.
A ranger patrol salutes the party and provides fresh trail rations.

tables.title: Dungeon Crossroads
tables.description: Moments that make corridors feel alive.

entries.result: A sliding wall resets the map, revealing an unfamiliar passage.
Animated armor demands a password last spoken centuries ago.
Torchlight flickers as a rival delve party flees an unseen threat.
A spectral scribe offers guidance in exchange for a written secret.
A heavy portcullis crashes down, splitting the party in two.
A pool reflects the next room instead of the current hallway.
A mimic disguised as a rope bridge tests cautious explorers.
Echoes of drums rise; the denizens rally to defend their lair.
A prisoner begs release, promising a secret shortcut.
A shrine mural animates to quiz the heroes on local legends.

tables.title: Concourse Encounters
tables.description: Crowded station situations between docking bays and markets.

entries.result: Security drones scan for fugitives; one pings on a crew member.
A rival captain taunts the crew with a better cargo contract.
A courier collapses, dropping a datachip marked urgent.
A pop-up market offers prototype gear with questionable licenses.
A protest blocks access to the docks, chanting anti-corp slogans.
A maintenance worker begs escort to the reactor after sabotage threats.
A smuggler discreetly offers passage for stowaways the crew knows.
Docking clamps glitch, risking damage unless someone overrides controls.
A celebrity explorer signs autographs and invites the crew to a gala.
Station lockdown initiates; shutters slam down until the threat is found.

tables.title: Forest Whispers
tables.description: Quiet prompts to spark roleplay while camping in ancient woods.

entries.result: Distant drums thrum beneath the earth, syncing with a hero's heartbeat.
A tree scar forms the party crest, fresh sap glistening like ink.
Owls repeat the last thing each hero said, but out of order.
An emerald fox leaves a trail of glowing pawprints circling the camp.
A dream of roots and rivers leaves someone waking with wet boots.
A broken arrow tied with silver thread points toward unseen ruins.
Motes of light hover over anyone who lies, revealing secrets at dawn.
A lullaby drifts through the leaves in a language none remember learning.

tables.title: Dungeon Atmosphere Prompts
tables.description: Flavor to set tone between combats.

entries.result: Moss grows in the outline of a vanished door.
Faint singing echoes, resolving into the party's marching tune.
Dust falls as something massive shifts overhead.
Carved names of past delvers glow briefly when touched.
A cold breeze carries the smell of rain—impossible this deep.
Skeletons arranged as though dining silently at a stone table.
Whispers try to finish each hero's sentences.
A rusted bell rings once, then crumbles into dust.

tables.title: Station Sparks
tables.description: Quick prompts to color downtime aboard the habitat.

entries.result: Artificial dawn glitches; half the station stays dim for hours.
An old war mural lights up, showing ships the crew doesn't recognize.
A vendor sells freeze-dried snacks named after the crew's ship.
Gravity cycling to 0.3g sparks impromptu microgravity performances.
A holo-news ticker scrolls rumors about the crew's last mission.
A child asks for help finding a missing maintenance bot.
A veteran salvager tells a ghost story about the unused docking ring.
A sun flare paints the viewport copper, delaying faster-than-light lanes.

tables.title: Deepwood Weather Turns
tables.description: Quick swings in forest weather and terrain hazards.

entries.result: A choking pollen cloud imposes disadvantage on speech-based checks.
Sudden downpour floods low paths, adding hours to travel time.
Biting insects swarm; exposed creatures must rest in smoke or nets.
Moonlit auroras grant advantage to Wisdom (Perception) checks until dawn.
A landslide blocks the trail, revealing a buried stone archway.
Unseasonal frost coats the canopy; tracks are easy to follow for a mile.

tables.title: Underground Hazards
tables.description: Low-prep hazards to mix into dungeon movement.

entries.result: Poison gas seeps from cracks; holding breath is required to proceed.
Flooded stairs demand Athletics checks or falling prone.
Sonic resonances disorient; spoken commands echo as thunderclaps.
A magic null zone suppresses spells for the next two rooms.
An unstable ceiling sheds debris whenever loud noises occur.
A rotating hallway realigns destination doors each hour.

tables.title: Station Glitches
tables.description: Malfunctions that add tension or urgency.

entries.result: Atmospheric processors hiccup, dropping oxygen levels for ten minutes.
Gravity plating pulses, flinging unsecured objects across the deck.
Thermal alarms scream as coolant leaks into maintenance tunnels.
Docking guidance failures threaten to collide two shuttles.
Holo-projectors overlay outdated security zones, confusing navigation.
An unscheduled reactor purge forces a timed evacuation of central modules.

tables.title: Mysterious Missives
tables.description: Letters, notes, and rumors that kick off a session.

entries.result: A letter arrives from the future warning of tonight’s betrayal.
A sealed package bears the party crest but no sender.
A dream is followed by a map drawn in morning dew on the window.
A courier collapses, revealing a message addressed to the wrong heroes.
Town criers spread word of a bounty that mentions each hero by name.
A coded flyer promises power to anyone who attends a midnight auction.
A rival leaves a taunting invitation to settle matters in an abandoned mill.
An unsigned note pleads for help and includes a single scorched scale.
